column5: hey all had a few peps out sat/sun and we went 16 for 25,with the change in temp they were a little slow,sat was great and sun was slow but we did land some nice eaters.with a little stable wheather they will hit even better,i got no pics of the 4 fellas in my rental huts but they broke off a monster,iced a 6-7lb pike and iced around 12 jumbo perch,man they were big.heres a few pics when i had time to take a few .
WOW....Thats a great catch for sure !!!!!.  ..glad you had safe ice,nice pics too....cheers
congrats on a nice looking catch
hey all i should make it clear that i caught non of these fish,i took pics of my customers fish and did not take any of the 4 i caught,just thought id say that. thanks Hawg Hunter
Nice fish good to see you putting your customers on the fish gotta love those eyes  rob
WTG man nice catch of eyes for sure can't wait to be on the ice in Quinte next month.
How deep were are you getting the fish and what presentations are working?
Sweet, nice catches there bud.  I'll bet they tasted delicious.  Joey
Great report!  I dont really ice fish, but seeing all these reports makes me almost wanna try it again...LOL.

were fishing 15' of water,sidewinders.silver williams whobler,hopkins spoon in chartreuse,blue/silver,red,hammered blue&silver little cleos.x-1 gold rocket are all good prodoucers.these eyes are an average day for us like i said we fish 7 days a week morning and afternoon to make sure were on eyes for our customers.... taker easy Hawg Hunter
